main.description: A post in an Atrarium group timeline. Posts are stored in the user's Personal Data Server (PDS) and indexed via AT Protocol Firehose. GroupId is immutable and survives stage transitions (theme → group → graduated).

text.description: Post text content (plain text fallback, required even if markdown is provided)

markdown.description: Optional Markdown-formatted content (extended syntax: tables, strikethrough, task lists). If provided, clients should render this instead of plain text. Raw HTML is blocked.

emojiShortcodes.description: Optional array of emoji shortcodes used in this post (for indexing and caching). Group-approved emoji only.

groupId.description: Group identifier (8-character hex, system-generated). Immutable across stage transitions.
